short_summary: ACQUIRED Electrical and Electronic Properties Measuring and Testing Instruments
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Item 1, GSIN: N6625, NSN: 01-3247618, AMMETERPart No.: 50379-2, NCAGE: 89357, EVOQUA WATER TECHNOLOGIESORPart No.: 67420-7, NCAGE: 89357, EVOQUA WATER TECHNOLOGIESQuantity: 16, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.Item 2, GSIN: N6625, NSN: 01-3247618, AMMETERPart No.: 50379-2, NCAGE: 89357, EVOQUA WATER TECHNOLOGIESORPart No.: 67420-7, NCAGE: 89357, EVOQUA WATER TECHNOLOGIESQuantity: 11, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Reference Number
PW-22-01009291

### Procurement Title
Request for Proposal for AMMETER
### Solicitation Number
W8482-229543/B

### Tender Details
*   **Request Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Status**: Expiré

### Goods and Services Details
*   **Goods and Services Name**: AMMETER
*   **National Stock Number (NSN)**: 01-3247618
*   **GSIN Code**: N6625
*   **Description**: Electrical and Electronic Properties Measuring and Testing Instruments
*   **Number of Units**: 27 (16 units for CFB Halifax and 11 units for CFB Esquimalt)

### Delivery Locations
*   **Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia**
*   **Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia**

### Preferred Language for Submission
*   Both official languages of Canada (English and French)

### Important Dates
*   **Notice Publication Date**: 2022-10-18
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-02T14:00:00 (expired)
*   **Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Contract End Date**: None

### Suppliers Information
*   **Solicitation Contact**: Ashley Nadeau-Weeks, ASHLEY.NADEAU-WEEKS@forces.gc.ca
*   **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Required Submission Documents
The following documents can be downloaded from the links below.

*   **English RFP Clauses**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/86b33d90f0341ae3937869f0b1e21ba9/w8482-229543b_english_rfp_clauses.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/86b33d90f0341ae3937869f0b1e21ba9/w8482-229543b_english_rfp_cl
